aboutservice: We care Frer checkup to those who are below poverty level in our country
extraDetails: An NHS Health Check takes about 20 to 30 minutes.The health professional – often a nurse or healthcare assistant – will ask you some questions about your lifestyle and family history, measure your height and weight, and take your blood pressure and do a blood test. The blood test will be done either before the check with a blood sample from your arm, or at the check.our blood test results can show your chances of getting heart disease, stroke, kidney disease and diabetes.If you're over 65, you will also be told the signs and symptoms of dementia to look out for.

aboutservice: Through our exclusive technology, specialized process and total dedication to our patients, G4 by Golpa Precision Implant Dentistry brings new hope to all those suffering from chronic dental issues. Our goal is to completely transform every smile we see—and give people the opportunity to live their best lives. .
extraDetails: When you’re constantly worrying about your teeth, it takes over almost every part of your life. It consumes you. And all you want is a permanent solution for what seems like a never-ending problem. The G4 Implant Solution is the to get dental implants that look and feel like the real thing. It’s 100% permanent and 100% complete in 24 hours. So you can get back to living your modern life.
